issue.subject: GeoExt.ux.Profile action
issue.description:
This would be a nice feature for MAP V2 (just need a World profil service - the example uses geo.admin.ch profil api ):

http://dev.geoext.org/sandbox/cmoullet/ux/Profile/examples/profile.html

What do you think Thomas ?

journals.notes: Yes it's nice but I don't think it's adapted to a SDI viewer. This is more a specific function for a specific tool. I think the MAP is not a tool for managing business data but only a tool to display simply the SDI datas.

I agree... it should not be a "must have" feature.
Nevertheless, I see those features as valuable to add "attractivity" to the MAP.

And I wanted to emphasize the fact that by using GeoExt, we have several tools available quickly with minor integration effort. We should keep that in mind for future development.
Issue is rejected regarding last notes and as GeoExt is used to build last easySDI MAP versions...
